params:
  group_name: "Super League S6"
  tournament_ruleset: "EB25"
---
```{r echo = FALSE, fig.align="center" ,  out.width = "150%"}

knitr::include_graphics("EB25.jpg")
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
group_name <- params$group_name
tournament_ruleset <- params$tournament_ruleset

if(group_name == "EB25 training") {
  df_rosters <- read.csv(file = "../datasets/v0.7/df_rosters_eb2025.csv")
} else if (group_name == "Super League S6") {
  df_rosters <- read.csv(file = "../datasets/v0.8/df_rosters_super_league_s6.csv")
}

races <- unique(df_rosters$roster.name)
races <- sort(races)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis', out.width = "150%", fig.align = "center"}
for (i in 1:length(races)) {
  # race_name <- "High Elf"
  race_name <- races[i]
  plotname <- paste0(tournament_ruleset, "/", group_name, "_roster_plot_", race_name, ".png")
  cat(paste0("![](", gsub(" ", "_", plotname), ")"))
  
  cat("\n\n\\newpage\n")
  
  plotname <- paste0(tournament_ruleset, "/", group_name, "_", "percentage-stat_plot_", race_name, ".png")
  cat(paste0("![](", gsub(" ", "_", plotname), ")"))
  
  # plotname <- paste0(tournament_ruleset, "/", group_name, "_", "team-stat_plot_", race_name, ".png")
  # cat(paste0("![](", gsub(" ", "_", plotname), ")"))
  
  cat("\n\n\\newpage\n")

}

```
